name: TripScout, Inc.
description: Operator of a travel booking platform intended to have a better traveling experience. The company's platform leveraged the power of a vast social media network, it offers modern travelers affordable, dream-worthy accommodations and a journey enriched with curated insights from its 70 million+ travel-obsessed community, enabling travelers to have a seamless, well-cared-for travel experience.
one_liner: Operator of a travel booking platform intended to have a better traveling experience. The company's platform leveraged the power of a vast social media network, it offers modern travelers affordable, dream-worthy accommodations and a journey enriched with curated insights from its 70 million+ travel-obsessed community, enabling travelers to have a seamless, well-cared-for travel experience.
